Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence or support to fully back up the assertion that John McCain voted against funding the troops solely because of the timeline.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for John McCain's vote against funding the troops that are not mentioned in the claim.
